algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the 20-day exponential moving average of the 'close' divided by the 10-day exponential moving average of the 'volume', and then subtracts the 30-day cumulative sum of the 'amount'.
code:
def heuristics_v2(df):
    close_20_ema = df['close'].ewm(span=20, adjust=False).mean()
    volume_10_ema = df['volume'].ewm(span=10, adjust=False).mean()
    amount_30_sum = df['amount'].rolling(window=30).sum()
    heuristics_matrix = (close_20_ema / volume_10_ema) - amount_30_sum
    return heuristics_matrix

algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the 15-day exponential moving average of the 'close' divided by the 5-day exponential moving average of the 'volume', and then subtracts the 20-day cumulative sum of the 'amount'.
code:
def heuristics_v2(df):
    close_15_ema = df['close'].ewm(span=15, adjust=False).mean()
    volume_5_ema = df['volume'].ewm(span=5, adjust=False).mean()
    amount_20_sum = df['amount'].rolling(window=20).sum()
    heuristics_matrix = (close_15_ema / volume_5_ema) - amount_20_sum
    return heuristics_matrix

algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the 20-day standard deviation of the 'close' divided by the 10-day standard deviation of the 'volume', and then adds the 30-day cumulative sum of the 'amount'.
code:
def heuristics_v2(df):
    close_20_std = df['close'].rolling(window=20).std()
    volume_10_std = df['volume'].rolling(window=10).std()
    amount_30_sum = df['amount'].rolling(window=30).sum()
    heuristics_matrix = (close_20_std / volume_10_std) + amount_30_sum
    return heuristics_matrix

algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the product of the 10-day moving average of the 'close' and the 20-day moving average of the 'volume', then subtracts the difference between the 5-day maximum of the 'high' and the 5-day minimum of the 'low'.
code:
def heuristics_v2(df):
    close_10_ma = df['close'].rolling(window=10).mean()
    volume_20_ma = df['volume'].rolling(window=20).mean()
    high_5_max = df['high'].rolling(window=5).max()
    low_5_min = df['low'].rolling(window=5).min()
    heuristics_matrix = (close_10_ma * volume_20_ma) - (high_5_max - low_5_min)
    return heuristics_matrix

algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the 10-day standard deviation of the 'close' divided by the 5-day standard deviation of the 'volume', and then adds the 20-day cumulative sum of the 'amount'.
code:
def heuristics_v2(df):
    close_10_std = df['close'].rolling(window=10).std()
    volume_5_std = df['volume'].rolling(window=5).std()
    amount_20_sum = df['amount'].rolling(window=20).sum()
    heuristics_matrix = (close_10_std / volume_5_std) + amount_20_sum
    return heuristics_matrix

algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the ratio of the 5-day moving average of the 'high' to the 10-day moving average of the 'low', and then adds the 20-day simple moving average of the 'volume' minus the 30-day simple moving average of the 'amount'.
code:
def heuristics_v2(df):
    high_5_ma = df['high'].rolling(window=5).mean()
    low_10_ma = df['low'].rolling(window=10).mean()
    volume_20_ma = df['volume'].rolling(window=20).mean()
    amount_30_ma = df['amount'].rolling(window=30).mean()
    heuristics_matrix = (high_5_ma / low_10_ma) + (volume_20_ma - amount_30_ma)
    return heuristics_matrix

algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the ratio of the 7-day moving average of the 'close' to the 15-day moving average of the 'open', and then subtracts the 10-day simple moving average of the 'volume' from the 30-day simple moving average of the 'amount'.
code:
def heuristics_v2(df):
    close_7_ma = df['close'].rolling(window=7).mean()
    open_15_ma = df['open'].rolling(window=15).mean()
    amount_30_ma = df['amount'].rolling(window=30).mean()
    volume_10_ma = df['volume'].rolling(window=10).mean()
    heuristics_matrix = (close_7_ma / open_15_ma) + (amount_30_ma - volume_10_ma)
    return heuristics_matrix

algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the 15-day moving average of the 'close' divided by the 20-day moving average of the 'open', and then subtracts the 10-day exponential moving average of the 'volume' from the 30-day simple moving average of the 'amount'.
code:
def heuristics_v2(df):
    close_15_ma = df['close'].rolling(window=15).mean()
    open_20_ma = df['open'].rolling(window=20).mean()
    volume_10_ema = df['volume'].ewm(span=10, adjust=False).mean()
    amount_30_ma = df['amount'].rolling(window=30).mean()
    heuristics_matrix = (close_15_ma / open_20_ma) - (amount_30_ma - volume_10_ema)
    return heuristics_matrix

algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the ratio of the 7-day moving average of the 'high' to the 15-day moving average of the 'low', and then subtracts the 25-day simple moving average of the 'volume' from the 35-day simple moving average of the 'amount'.
code:
def heuristics_v2(df):
    high_7_ma = df['high'].rolling(window=7).mean()
    low_15_ma = df['low'].rolling(window=15).mean()
    volume_25_ma = df['volume'].rolling(window=25).mean()
    amount_35_ma = df['amount'].rolling(window=35).mean()
    heuristics_matrix = (high_7_ma / low_15_ma) - (volume_25_ma - amount_35_ma)
    return heuristics_matrix

algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the ratio of the 7-day moving average of the 'high' to the 14-day moving average of the 'low', and then adds the 25-day simple moving average of the 'amount' minus the 35-day simple moving average of the 'volume'.
code:
def heuristics_v2(df):
    high_7_ma = df['high'].rolling(window=7).mean()
    low_14_ma = df['low'].rolling(window=14).mean()
    amount_25_ma = df['amount'].rolling(window=25).mean()
    volume_35_ma = df['volume'].rolling(window=35).mean()
    heuristics_matrix = (high_7_ma / low_14_ma) + (amount_25_ma - volume_35_ma)
    return heuristics_matrix
